Authors

Studium has translated original material from a variety of authors who originally published in Latin or German. In many cases, contributors have prepared brief biographies of the most prominent authors in our catalog.

The complete list of original authors is below. Click any author's card to visit a page with biographical details and a list of all works from that author. The icon indicates an available biography.

Jakob Andreae
1528–1590
Anonymous

1499–1570

1561–1619

1521–1600
